remarks: Equality deduction for line mirroring.  Theorem 10.7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ismid.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismid.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
ismid.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ismid.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
ismid.1 $e |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
lmif.m $e |- M = ( ( lInvG ` G ) ` D ) $.
lmif.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
lmif.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. ran L ) $.
lmicl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
lmieq.c $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
lmieq.d $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` A ) = ( M ` B ) ) $.
lmieq $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
